get.description: This API retrieves liquidation data for coins across all exchanges

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Trading coin (e.g., BTC).  Retrieve supported coins via the 'support-coins' API.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Time range for data aggregation.  Supported values: 1h, 4h, 12h, 24h.

get.description: This API retrieves liquidation orders within the past 7 days, including details about the specific exchange, trading pairs, and liquidation amounts

parameters.name: exchange
parameters.description: Exchange name (e.g., Binance, OKX). Retrieve supported exchanges via the 'support-exchange-pair' API.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Trading coin (e.g., BTC). Retrieve supported coins via the 'support-coins' API.

parameters.name: min_liquidation_amount
parameters.description: Minimum threshold for liquidation events.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start timestamp in milliseconds (e.g., 1641522717000).

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End timestamp in milliseconds (e.g., 1641522717000).

get.description: This API presents and maps liquidation events based on market data and diverse leverage amounts

parameters.description: Trading pair (e.g., BTCUSDT). Retrieve supported pairs via the 'support-exchange-pair' API.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Time range for data aggregation. Supported values: 1d, 7d.
